document.masterDocTitle: Revision of the genus Glyphotmethis Bey-Bienko, 1951 (Orthoptera: Pamphagidae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Revision of the genus Glyphotmethis Bey-Bienko, 1951 (Orthoptera: Pamphagidae)

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Glyphotmethis heldreichi escherichi :
Karabağ et al. 1971: 85
.

subSubSection.paragraph: Previous records: Cejchan, 1965 : Asia Minor , Afyon , 19.6.1927 , 1 ♂ , 1 ♀ , 19.5.1927 , 1 ♂ , 16.3.1927 , 1 ♀ , 1.6.1927 , 2 ♀ , leg. Tockhorn; Kütahya , 28.7.1927 , 1 ♀ , leg. Bauman (Dtsch. Ent. Inst. Berlin), Afyon , 9.6.1927 , 1 ♂ , leg. Tockhorn; Kütahya , 28.7.1927 , 1 ♀ , leg. Bauman (Zool. Inst. Leningrad); Weidner, 1969 : Konya , Akşehir, 7.1950, 1 ♂ ; Kozulca, 22.7.1939 , 1 ♂ , leg. et det. T. Karabaǧ (Zool. Mus . Hamburg) (not examined).

This subspecies is different from
G. dimorphus armenus
by the higher prozona, narrower and shorter male tegmina, hind femur with more blue color and distribution. It is near to
G. escherichi elatior
by the shape of metazona and coloration of hind femur in some specimens. But it is different from it by the broader and longer male tegmina (always shorter than abdomen in
G. escherichi elatior
), the ratio of prozona to metazona (prozona shorter in
G. dimorphus dimorphus
), narrower metazona and smaller body size.
Distribution: ( Fig. 17 ). Turkey : Afyonkarahisar , W of Konya : Akşehir and environs, Seydişehir, Kütahya , Isparta : Sutan Daǧları.

Remarks: The records given from “Afiun” ( Afyonkarahisar ) as
Tmethis escherichi ( Uvarov 1930 )
is belong to this subspecies.
